sentences.en: As he hurried along the road, he balanced the load with extreme nicety.
sentences.cn: 当他在路上急忙忙走过时, 他极为巧妙地使车上的载重不失平衡.

sentences.en: Everything was arranged to a nicety.
sentences.cn: 每一件事情都安排得十分妥当.

sentences.en: He figured out his program for the day to a nicety.
sentences.cn: 他已经巧妙地排下了一天的工作程序.

sentences.en: He judged the distance to a nicety.
He judged the distance to the nicety.
sentences.cn: 他很细密地判定了距离.

sentences.en: He judged the weight to a nicety.
I must say they become one another to a nicety.
sentences.cn: 我只好说他们恰好不相上下.

sentences.en: The character of the hero is depicted to a nicety.
sentences.cn: 男主人公的性格刻画得非常细腻.

sentences.en: The job calls for nicety of judgment.
sentences.cn: 这一工作要求判断精确.

sentences.en: The powders were neatly enough made up, but not with the nicety of the dispensing chemist.
sentences.cn: 药粉制备得挺精致.但不如店里药剂师做得出色.

sentences.en: The white flowers in spring, accompany with the all – life nicety.
sentences.cn: 春天的百花陪伴一生的美好.

sentences.en: This is a point of great nicety.
This kind of work required extreme nicety and minute attention on the part of the workmen.
sentences.cn: 这种工作要求工人技术熟练,一分钟也不能粗心大意.

sentences.en: You can see with what nicety we have to trim our sails between chemistry and history.
sentences.cn: 你瞧在化学课和历史课之间,我们需要多么小心地见风使舵.
